## Load Packages

```{r}
library(flextable)
library(broom)
```

## Data Generation

```{r}
set.seed(123)
n <- 100
x1 <- rnorm(n)
x2 <- rnorm(n)
x3 <- rnorm(n)
y1 <- 1 + 2*x1 + rnorm(n)
y2 <- 1 + 3*x2 + rnorm(n)
y3 <- 1 + 4*x3 + rnorm(n)

data <- data.frame(y1, y2, y3, x1, x2, x3)
```

## Create Regression Models

```{r}
model1 <- lm(y1 ~ x1 + x2 + x3, data = data)
model2 <- lm(y2 ~ x1 + x2 + x3, data = data)
model3 <- lm(y3 ~ x1 + x2 + x3, data = data)
```

## Tidy Models with Broom

```{r}
tidy_model1 <- broom::tidy(model1)
tidy_model2 <- broom::tidy(model2)
tidy_model3 <- broom::tidy(model3)
```

## Display Results with Flextable

```{r}
ft1 <- flextable(tidy_model1)
ft2 <- flextable(tidy_model2)
ft3 <- flextable(tidy_model3)

ft1
ft2
ft3
```
